body:
Misses the image I run, we can argue about more fields too
```
$ kc describe deploy
Name:			nginx
Namespace:		default
CreationTimestamp:	Tue, 13 Dec 2016 14:54:23 +0100
Labels:			name=nginx-undo
Selector:		name=nginx-undo
Replicas:		2 updated | 842354255776 total | 2 available | 2 unavailable
StrategyType:		RollingUpdate
MinReadySeconds:	0
RollingUpdateStrategy:	1 max unavailable, 1 max surge
Conditions:
  Type		Status	Reason
  ----		------	------
  Available 	True	MinimumReplicasAvailable
OldReplicaSets:	nginx-2812786133 (0/842353733888 replicas created), nginx-3142235609 (0/842353338192 replicas created), nginx-3224745434 (0/842353205456 replicas created), nginx-3389568476 (0/842353077040 replicas created), nginx-3719214560 (0/842352825968 replicas created), nginx-3472012765 (0/842352977168 replicas created), nginx-3554522590 (0/842352983344 replicas created), nginx-3225007578 (0/842353207792 replicas created), nginx-3307255259 (0/842353211664 replicas created), nginx-3554325982 (0/842352981216 replicas created), nginx-3554391518 (0/842352981888 replicas created), nginx-3801593313 (0/842352648352 replicas created), nginx-2895164886 (0/842353736848 replicas created), nginx-314819091 (2/842353341736 replicas created), nginx-3224876506 (0/842353206624 replicas created), nginx-3389765084 (0/842353079280 replicas created), nginx-3471947229 (0/842352976640 replicas created), nginx-3142497753 (0/842353340608 replicas created), nginx-3389371868 (0/842353075296 replicas created), nginx-3472143837 (0/842352978496 replicas created), nginx-3636704735 (0/842352821328 replicas created), nginx-3636835807 (0/842352822656 replicas created), nginx-3224614362 (0/842353343440 replicas created), nginx-3719083488 (0/842352824736 replicas created), nginx-3636770271 (0/842352822096 replicas created), nginx-3883972066 (0/842352650160 replicas created), nginx-3060119000 (0/842353337088 replicas created), nginx-3224810970 (0/842353206032 replicas created), nginx-3306993115 (0/842353209440 replicas created), nginx-3472078301 (0/842352977920 replicas created), nginx-3554194910 (0/842352979760 replicas created), nginx-3307386331 (0/842353212912 replicas created), nginx-3389634012 (0/842353077616 replicas created), nginx-3554457054 (0/842352982512 replicas created)
NewReplicaSet:	nginx-3966416355 (2/842352651248 replicas created)
Events:

  ---------	--------	-----	----				-------------	--------	------			-------
  4m		4m		1	{deployment-controller }		Normal		ScalingReplicaSet	Scaled up replica set nginx-314819091 to 3
  3m		3m		1	{deployment-controller }		Normal		ScalingReplicaSet	Scaled up replica set nginx-3189421475 to 1
  3m		3m		1	{deployment-controller }		Normal		ScalingReplicaSet	Scaled down replica set nginx-314819091 to 2
  3m		3m		1	{deployment-controller }		Normal		ScalingReplicaSet	Scaled up replica set nginx-3189421475 to 2
  3m		3m		1	{deployment-controller }		Normal		ScalingReplicaSet	Scaled down replica set nginx-3189421475 to 0
```

@kubernetes/kubectl @kubernetes/sig-cli @kubernetes/deployment

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: Deployment description lacks basic info
